pages.title: Blue Wildebeest
pages.text: The blue wildebeest ($(o)Connochaetes taurinus$()), also called the common wildebeest, white-bearded gnu or brindled gnu, is a large antelope and one of the two species of wildebeest.$(br2)It is placed in the genus Connochaetes and family Bovidae, and has a close taxonomic relationship with the black wildebeest.

pages.title: Blue Wildebeest
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:grass$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: None Days
